8 LP1_RC_TPT::LP1_RC_TPT()
9 : sample_rate(0.0),
10 s(0.0)

18 void LP1_RC_TPT::reset(double _sample_rate)
19 {
20 sample_rate = _sample_rate;
21
22 s = 0.0;
23 g1 = 0.0;
24 }
25
26 double LP1_RC_TPT::process(double x)
27 {
28 // Calculate output sample
29 double v = g1 * (x - s);
30 double y = v + s;
31
32 // Update state register
33 s = v + y;
34
35 return y;
36 }
37
38 void LP1_RC_TPT::set_cutoff(double cutoff)
39 {
40 // Calculate gamma from cutoff
41 const double w = bdsp::constants::TWO_PI * cutoff;
42 const double g = w / (2.0 * sample_rate);
43 g1 = g / (1.0 + g);
44 }
45
46 void LP1_RC_TPT::set_cutoff_prewarp(double cutoff)
47 {
48 // Calculate gamma from prewarped cutoff
49 const double w_prewarped = mappings::prewarp(cutoff, sample_rate);
50 const double g = w_prewarped / (2.0 * sample_rate);
51 g1 = g / (1.0 + g);
52 }
53
54 void LP1_RC_TPT::set_cutoff_g1(double _g1)
55 {
56 g1 = _g1;
57 }
58
59 double LP1_RC_TPT::get_state() const
60 {
61 return s;
62 }
63
64 } // filter
65} // bdsp
